mapinfo.detailsText:
Town centers are located at the opposite extremes of this mountainous region, divided by a rock face. Follow the tortuous trade routes that meander through the mountains to seek new resouces for your colony.
 
 Researching stagecoach on one trade route also upgrades the other one.
 
 Native Civs: Comanche 
 Mercenaries: Pistolero / Renegado 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Rikikipu 
 Observer UI by Aizamk

Town centers are located at the opposite extremes of this mountainous region, divided by a rock face. Follow the tortuous trade routes that meander through the mountains to seek new resouces for your colony. 
 
---------------------------------
